location.label: Location
location.toolTip: Region where the Data Collection Rule will be deployed. Use the same region as your Log Analytics workspace.

basics.name: workspaceName
basics.label: Log Analytics workspace name
basics.toolTip: Name of the Log Analytics workspace that will receive the Windows Security events.

constraints.validationMessage: Workspace name must be 4-63 characters; alphanumeric and hyphens only.

options.text: Configure Data Collection Rules (DCRs). Deploy Windows DCRs (Security and System/Application logs) and/or Unmanaged Collector DCRs (syslog, CEF, Cisco) to your Log Analytics workspace.

elements.name: deployWindowsDcrs
elements.label: Deploy Windows DCR?
elements.toolTip: When checked, both the Windows Security DCR and the System/Application logs DCR will be created and linked to your Log Analytics workspace.

elements.name: windowsDcrName
elements.label: Windows Security DCR name
elements.toolTip: Name for the Windows Security Data Collection Rule. Must be unique in the resource group.

constraints.validationMessage: Use alphanumeric characters, hyphens, underscores, or periods.

elements.name: systemAppDcrName
elements.label: System/Application DCR name
elements.toolTip: Name for the System and Application logs Data Collection Rule. Must be unique in the resource group.

constraints.validationMessage: Use alphanumeric characters, hyphens, underscores, or periods.

elements.name: deployUnmanagedCollectorDcr
elements.label: Deploy Unmanaged Collector DCR?
elements.toolTip: When checked, you can optionally deploy syslog, CEF, or Cisco DCRs for unmanaged collectors.

elements.name: deploySyslogDcr
elements.label: Deploy syslog DCR?
elements.toolTip: When checked, a syslog Data Collection Rule will be created for Linux/syslog sources.

elements.name: syslogDcrName
elements.label: Syslog DCR name
elements.toolTip: Name for the syslog Data Collection Rule. Must be unique in the resource group.

constraints.validationMessage: Use alphanumeric characters, hyphens, underscores, or periods.

elements.name: deployCefDcr
elements.label: Deploy CEF DCR?
elements.toolTip: When checked, a Common Event Format (CEF) Data Collection Rule will be created.

elements.name: cefDcrName
elements.label: CEF DCR name
elements.toolTip: Name for the CEF Data Collection Rule. Must be unique in the resource group.

constraints.validationMessage: Use alphanumeric characters, hyphens, underscores, or periods.

elements.name: deployCiscoDcr
elements.label: Deploy Cisco DCR?
elements.toolTip: Cisco DCR deployment is not yet configured. You can set the name for future use.

elements.name: ciscoDcrName
elements.label: Cisco DCR name
elements.toolTip: Name for the Cisco DCR (for future deployment). Must be unique in the resource group.

constraints.validationMessage: Use alphanumeric characters, hyphens, underscores, or periods.
